section.para: The common driver package can be downloaded from Eclipse NeoSCADA at http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/eclipsescada/downloads/org.eclipse.scada/drops/0.2.0/R201501260629/msi/common_driver_0.2.0_x86.msi for 32bit and at http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/eclipsescada/downloads/org.eclipse.scada/drops/0.2.0/R201501260629/msi/common_driver_0.2.0_x64.msi for 64bit.

The main application modules are provisioned by the configurator IDE on the Windows platform since Windows does not provide a software repository mechanism like YUM or APT. So the result from the configuration run on Windows will be ready-to-run MSI files.
